response.output: {"is_vuln": "yes", "cwe": "CWE-22", "title": "Directory Traversal via user-controlled path", "rationale": "The application constructs a file path by concatenating a hardcoded `../` prefix with user-supplied input from `req.query.n`. This allows an attacker to traverse directories and read arbitrary files on the server's filesystem."}

parts.text: {"is_vuln": "yes", "cwe": "CWE-22", "title": "Directory Traversal via user-controlled path", "rationale": "The application constructs a file path by concatenating a hardcoded `../` prefix with user-supplied input from `req.query.n`. This allows an attacker to traverse directories and read arbitrary files on the server's filesystem."}

vars.code: app.get('/f',(req,res)=>{const fs=require('fs'); const p = '../' + req.query.n; res.send(fs.readFileSync(p,'utf8'));}); // CWE-22
vars.label: yes

vars.code: app.get('/f',(req,res)=>{const fs=require('fs'); const name=req.query.n; if(!/^[\w\-.]+$/.test(name)) return res.status(400).end(); res.send(fs.readFileSync(`safe/${name}`,'utf8'));});
vars.label: no
